categories.name: Categories
categories.description: Displays for each product all the categories it's associated to
categories.warning: Sorting is based on a csv string of category IDs

carts_count.name: Carts Number
carts_count.description: Displays the number of carts containing each product

number_in_carts.name: Quantity in Carts
number_in_carts.description: Displays the quantity of each product contained in carts

wishlists_count.name: Wishlists Number
wishlists_count.description: Displays the number of wishlists containing each product

number_in_wishlists.name: Quantity in Wishlists
number_in_wishlists.description: Displays the quantity of each product contained in wishlists

stock_min_qty.name: Qty to become Out of Stock

status_color.name: Status (With Color)
status_color.description: Displays the status and colorizes the row

use_default_behaviour.label: Use Default Behaviour
use_default_behaviour.description: Applies by default the use of an "options" renderer with customer group values (still overridable by rendering options)

original_currency_column_type.label: Column Type
original_currency_column_type.description: If no currency is found with choosen column, then base currency will be used

original_currency_column_position.label: Column Position
original_currency_column_position.description: Indicate here the position of the column among all ones sharing the same field name. If given position does not exist or is empty, then the first corresponding column will be used

display_currency_column_type.label: Column Type
display_currency_column_type.description: If no currency is found with choosen column, then base currency will be used

display_currency_column_position.label: Column Position
display_currency_column_position.description: Indicate here the position of the column among all ones sharing the same field name. If given position does not exist or is empty, then the first corresponding column will be used

store.name: Store View
store.description: Displays a store view from its ID

flat_key.label: Flat Value Key
flat_key.description: If no ID is found, then the value corresponding to the given key will be displayed. If none is set, "store_name" will be used

country.name: Country
country.description: Displays a country name from its code

eu_country.name: EU Country
eu_country.description: Displays whether a country belongs to the EU

base_display_format.label: Base Display Format
base_display_format.description:
Available variables : {is_eu_country}, {country_code}, {country_name}
(variables will be replaced by the corresponding values).
If no value is set, "{is_eu_country}" will be used by default

export_display_format.label: Export Display Format
export_display_format.description: If no value is set, then the base display format will be used

custom_source.label: Custom Source
custom_source.description:
Choose "Yes" to use a custom source of EU countries.
For Magento versions < 1.7, you should always use this option as there is no base EU countries list by default

options.name: Options
options.description: Displays a value from an options source

display_full_path.label: Display Full Path
display_full_path.description: For sources with multiple levels of options, display labels of all levels, and not just last one

imploded_values.label: Merged Values
imploded_values.description: Choose "Yes" if the field contains multiple values separated by a given string

imploded_separator.label: Values Separator
imploded_separator.description: If no value is set, "," will be used

exact_filter.label: Exact Filter
exact_filter.description: Choose "Yes" if the filter must match the entire value, and not just be contained within

single_wildcard.label: Wildcard for single character
single_wildcard.description: Must be exactly one character. If none is set, no wildcard of this kind will be available at all

multiple_wildcard.label: Wildcard for multiple characters
multiple_wildcard.description: Must be exactly one character, differing from the wildcard for single character. If no valid value is set, no wildcard of this kind will be available at all

parse_tags.label: Parse CMS Tags
parse_tags.description: Unless you know there is a difference, you can consider that blocks and pages templates processors are the same

default_source_id.label: Default Options Source
default_source_id.description: This options source will be used if no options are found for choosen attribute

force_default_source.label: Force use of default options source

display_full_path.label: Display Full Path
display_full_path.description: For sources with multiple levels of options, display labels of all levels, and not just last one

display_images.label: Display Images
display_images.description: If you choose "No", only images names will be displayed

display_images_urls.label: Display Complete Images URLs
display_images_urls.description: Images URLs are used as images titles, or as result if images are not displayed or on results export. If you choose "No", only the images paths within the media/catalog directory will be displayed

original_image_link.label: Original Image Link
original_image_link.description: If you choose "Yes", the images / names will point to the original images URLs

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.description: If you specify an image width, then you should indicate an image height too

image_height.label: Image Height
image_height.description: If you specify an image height, then you should indicate an image width too

browser_resize_only.label: Browser Resize Only
browser_resize_only.description:
Used when image dimensions are specified.
If you choose "Yes", the original full-size images will be used and resized, when needed, by your web browser only (regarding images URLs, only the original ones will likewise be displayed in all cases)

filter_on_name.label: Filter images on name
filter_on_name.description: If you choose "No", filter will apply on images existence

original_currency_column_type.label: Column Type
original_currency_column_type.description: If no currency is found with choosen column, then base currency will be used

original_currency_column_position.label: Column Position
original_currency_column_position.description: Indicate here the position of the column among all ones sharing the same field name. If given position does not exist or is empty, then the first corresponding column will be used

display_currency_column_type.label: Column Type
display_currency_column_type.description: If no currency is found with choosen column, then base currency will be used

display_currency_column_position.label: Column Position
display_currency_column_position.description: Indicate here the position of the column among all ones sharing the same field name. If given position does not exist or is empty, then the first corresponding column will be used

filter_time.label: Allow Filtering On Time
filter_time.description: Only for columns with time values

exact_filter.label: Exact Filter
exact_filter.description: Choose "Yes" if the filter must match the entire value, and not just be contained within

single_wildcard.label: Wildcard for single character
single_wildcard.description: Must be exactly one character. If none is set, no wildcard of this kind will be available at all

multiple_wildcard.label: Wildcard for multiple characters
multiple_wildcard.description: Must be exactly one character, differing from the wildcard for single character. If no valid value is set, no wildcard of this kind will be available at all

parse_tags.label: Parse CMS Tags
parse_tags.description: Unless you know there is a difference, you can consider that blocks and pages templates processors are the same
